price: ߔߙߏ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߛߋߣߍ߲߫ ߓߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ߛߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߟߊߞߢߊ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
